git install



ok so rebooted the machine
mention that it installs fail2ban
to protect your ssh login from ssh brute force bots
and an assortment of tools
nload, vnstat, htop, ctop, iostop
iotop *
etc



plex/radarr images auto update themselves on container start
but watchtower will restart them if it sees an update while they are running, but only when they are idle
